definition: fourth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fourth in order/letter "D" or Roman "IV" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 195°/butyl/cubes (of food)

sentences.english: The modification plan and engineering procedures are introduced for the removal of potential safety defects in sphere vessels' group storing butadiene.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了丁二烯球罐羣安全隱患的改造方案及工程實施。

sentences.english: Short CR, obtained by the polymerization of chloroprene.
sentences.chinese: 簡稱CR，由氯丁二烯聚合製得。

sentences.english: Thermoplastic polyurethane based on polybutadiene was prepared by using Haake mixer.
sentences.chinese: 利用哈克流變儀制備了熱塑性聚丁二烯型聚氨酯。

sentences.english: A polymer of chloroprene widely used as an oil and heat resistant rubber.
sentences.chinese: 一種作爲耐油耐熱橡膠而廣泛使用的氯丁二烯聚合物。

sentences.english: Nitrile is a copolymer of butadiene and acrylonitrile.
sentences.chinese: 腈是一種丁二烯與丙烯腈的共聚物。

sentences.english: Synthetic rubber is a copolymer of butadiene and styrene.
sentences.chinese: 合成橡膠是丁二烯和苯乙烯的共聚物。

sentences.english: The properties of the blends are very similar to that of middle vinyl polybutadiene rubber.
sentences.chinese: 共混膠性能非常類似於中乙烯基聚丁二烯橡膠。

sentences.english: Liquid polybutadiene produced this way can be used as multiterial for green coating.
sentences.chinese: 製得的液體聚丁二烯調聚物可用作綠色塗料的原料。

sentences.english: Butane is converted to butadiene for synthetic rubber.
sentences.chinese: 丁烷則轉換成丁二烯，用來製造人造橡膠。

sentences.english: Microorganism Biodegradation of Acrylonitrile and Nitrile Hydratase;
sentences.chinese: 腈是一種丁二烯與丙烯腈的共聚物。
